page.title: 17THE HIGH SCHOOL.
page.content: The school known as Sheringham High School began in September 1980 in the buildings which were previously the Secondary Modern School. It has 650 all-ability children aged 11 to 16 from Sheringham, Holt, Kelling, Bodham Edgefield and Baconsthorpe. It has {very modern facilities including four {science labs., a spacious field of 15 {acres and gymnasium for P.E., and {specialist rooms to serve the purposes {of art, commerce, drama and music. It {has very well equipped craft rooms. The school has its own 30-seater bus which is used for field trips, team visits and educational visits. The children take G.C.E. "O" level,16+ and C.S.E. examinations and then either leave to obtain employment or go to the Paston Sixth Form College at North Walsham or the sixth form at Fakenham School.
